MinimalSelection.description:
A minimal selection object that contains the decision point ID and the selected options.
This is used to transition from an SSVC decision point to a selection.

namespace.description: The namespace of the decision point.
namespace.title: Namespace

version.description: The version of the SSVC object. This should be a valid semantic version string.
version.title: Version

values.description: A list of selected value keys from the decision point values.
values.title: Values

MinimalSelection.title: MinimalSelection

description: This schema defines the structure for selecting SSVC Decision Points and their evaluated values for a given vulnerability. Each vulnerability can have multiple Decision Points, and each Decision Point can have multiple selected values when full certainty is not available.

schemaVersion.description: The schema version of this selection list.
schemaVersion.title: Schemaversion

vulnerability_id.description: Optional vulnerability ID associated with the selections.
vulnerability_id.title: Vulnerability Id

selections.description: List of minimal selections made from decision points.
selections.title: Selections

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the selections were made, in ISO 8601 format.
timestamp.title: Timestamp
